message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CV 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with learning semantic representations and extends the distributional hypothesis to multilingual data. Additionally, the paper mentions cross-lingual document classification tasks, which is a common topic in the CL sub-category. 

The paper also involves machine learning techniques, which suggests that it could belong to the sub-categories cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). 

Furthermore, the paper discusses the use of embeddings, which is a common topic in the sub-category cs.IR (Information Retrieval). 

Finally, the paper mentions the use of models for document-level semantics, which could suggest that it belongs to the sub-category cs.CV (Computer Vision) as document analysis is a common topic in this field.
